text: The provisions of all acts of Congress relating to national banks shall apply in the several states, the District of Columbia, the several territories and possessions of the United States, and the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 47-1710.

DC CODE § 47-2508

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Financial Institution, Guaranty Company, and Public Utility Taxes. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Applicability of acts of Congress to national banks in the District of Columbia.
